text: Hi Everyone! I want to create a new custom object on the company view( right side) which shows the products used by the company

I’m new to HubSpot. When I run some node.js script to verify the API connection getting the error.

```Body: {"status":"error","message":"This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.","correlationId":"1650ce16-0f42-4ddd-977e-45241bb9dce2","errors":[{"message":"One or more of the following scopes are required.","context":{"requiredScopes":["e-commerce","tickets","media_bridge.read","contacts","crm.objects.custom.read","crm.objects.custom.write"]}}],"links":{"scopes":"<https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>"},"category":"MISSING_SCOPES"}```
The same error appears when all of the above scopes are selected in `Auth settings`.
Does anyone know why I would get this error?

Thanks.

:sprocket-dance: Hello HubSpot Developers! :sprocket-dance:

It’s no secret there there are lots of open questions in the HubSpot Developer Slack. We know this, we see this, and we want to make your experience better.

:broom: In an effort to streamline this community and make it easier to connect with your fellow developers, *we’re going to be archiving the total number of public channels, as well as renaming others.* (sneak peek at the changes <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fnwCzrYD2fLNPCYP7NNshTJi4gM36vWpHBTU0ALQaSQ/edit#gid=1564945604|here>):broom:

We’ll be providing updates in every channel impacted in advance of these changes, and the updates will go live in one week, on *May 9th*. We will be archiving channels (meaning they will still be searchable, none of your previous posts will be lost), so if we get feedback from y’all that any channel we’ve archived needs to be brought back, we will do so.

:sparkles:We’re hopeful this will be the first of many steps designed to help connect HubSpot developers allover the world and help you build with us more effectively!:sparkles:

I totally agree with the channels you chose to archive.

Can we also set automatic reminders for some best practices when asking a question?
• Edit your message when adding additional information instead of creating a new post
• Reply in thread
• Provide additional information or code examples
• …actually ask a question instead of telling us what you want
I want to help as many people as I can and these would make it a lot easier.
These are awesome ideas <@UGY6JNTB4> - we can definitely look into this. Stay tuned!
